Pre-Game Insights: The Boston Red Sox aim to stop a six-game road skid when they play the New York Yankees on September 13, 2024.
New York is 40-32 at home and leads MLB with 217 total home runs, while Boston ranks fourth in the AL with 183 total home runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The matchup is the 11th time these teams square off this season, with the season series tied 5-5.
Key performers include Aaron Judge for the Yankees and Tyler O'Neill for the Red Sox.
Others: Injuries for the Yankees include DJ LeMahieu, Cody Poteet, Jonathan Loaisiga, JT Brubaker, and Lou Trivino, while the Red Sox have several players on the IL with various injuries.
